text: The next meeting for the LSFM community is not planned yet. I have to contact the previous 2 groups who show some interest, namely Prof Pavone in Italy and Arne Seitz in Switzerland and will report here. We alaos informaly started to discuss the possibility to have a more structured community as the community has grown a bit and many sub topics have appeared...
